description: Assesses ability to give strong reasons to support an opinion

levels.4: Reasons are strong, specific, and clearly support the opinion
levels.3: Reasons are relevant and support the opinion
levels.2: Reasons are weak or only loosely connected to the opinion
levels.1: No real reasons given; just restates opinion

feedback_stems.strength: Your reasons were strong and convincing, especially
feedback_stems.growth: Make your reasons more specific—tell exactly WHY this supports your opinion

levels.4: Each reason includes a specific example or detail that makes it convincing
levels.3: Some examples or details support the reasons

feedback_stems.strength: You backed up your reasons with good examples like
feedback_stems.growth: Add a specific example for each reason to make your writing more convincing

levels.4: Reasons are organized from good to best, building a strong case
levels.3: Reasons are presented in a logical order
levels.2: Reasons are present but jumbled together

feedback_stems.strength: You organized your reasons well, saving the best for last
feedback_stems.growth: Put your reasons in order—try saving your strongest reason for the end
